review: I hated those ads popping up every few seconds of using this app, so I subscribed. After a few days I had to reinstall the app, I logged into my account, and now I have those ads back on again. I tried everything, but it stuck, so I cancelled my subscription. Although valid till July 2022. Worst possible experience.

I had to downgrade # of stars. Looks like, now, after 3 days you have to pay to do anything. I've found some good ringtones & sounds. Sometimes results are the same thing over & over. Search results are sometimes irrelevant. Also, they're mostly parts of songs, which is great for ringtones. But even when I search for "notification sounds", I don't really get small/short tones or sounds in the results. I'd like to see more short sounds & different types of tones I can use just for notifications.

I love the app and have had it for years since my first tablet. However there has been some issues with the app in the past year. Normally I'd give five stars because i do love it. But even with an account there has been bugs with loading and lately it seems like the app has capped how much of my saved content is shown. When i go back to the item (ringtones, notification tones, wallpapers) the favorited icon still is clicked. Is it a glich or is it how it's programed.

This app is awesome, it has amazing wallpapers and the cutest ringtones. It has a large variety of content to decorate your phone. You will never get bored using this app. And of u don't have enough z credits u have an option to view an ad to get what u want. I have never had any issues with this app crashing, I have always been able to get in right away. I will recommend this others

Great app if we ignore how many ads there are. Ignoring that this app is great, I can find almost anything I'm looking for, for notification sounds and wallpapers, it's truly amazing and very helpful. However the amount of ads makes it a pain to use which is why it's only 2 stars. There is an ad free version but I'm not about to pay money for it.

It's a very good app, with an acount you can save the ring tones and wallpapers and even make them into alarms. Though I will admit finding things isn't easy. Like a certain wording or a wallpaper telling people to not touch the phone. But if you keep at it you can find something you like. Though the constant ads are annoying.

Love this app, would love to give it 5 stars, but the items keep spinning and not playing when trying to test a sound. Please fix this. There doesn't seem to be any updates atm. I uninstalled and reinstalled to see if it fixes it. But time will tell. If it fixes it. I'll come and give the 4 stars because well, I need to see this fix last more than a really short period of time. The last update was Oct and already the issue is back. I know, that was the last time I had this issue and update fixed

Zedge used to be a good app back in the day. Now it's ACTUALLY unusable because 1. I tried to download a ringtone & it tells me to grant permission in settings... There is no option in settings or permissions, I've looked everywhere. The only permissions options are for Contacts, location, & notifications. And 2. Normally I don't mind ads because I understand devs need to make money but the amount of ads is.... Truly insane.

It has an incredible amount of ads. One after another and it pushes their subscription constantly. It also glitches a lot and causes it to plays ads that you can't see so you can't mute them. Ads also randomly pop up and cause you to click on them when you were actually trying to click on a ringtone. The buttons to close them are so small. It's not worth having. At all. Selection of ringtones doesn't make up for everything else.

Way, way, WAY too many ads. If you click a sound even slightly wrong, BAM! Multiple full-screen ads. There's a difference between "trying to monetize to cover development costs" and "too greedy to care". Avoid this app at all costs. And a pre-emptive "NO" to your "would you consider our ad-free subscription" question. No! Absolutely not! You've proven yourselves too greedy to trust.

What would otherwise be a fantastic app, is plagued with advertisements. Not just the normal amount. Excessive full page ads. Ads that won't show the close button until you clicked on its content. Also, they are stacked two at a time. I would recommend avoiding this app or uninstalling it immediately after downloading your wallpaper or ringtone to avoid tracking software.

This app has tons of ads. Look at a wallpaper, watch an ad. Download a wallpaper, watch an ad. Tinker with settings, watch an ad. I spent 3 minutes total in the app and had 5 ads. Also there's no way to use wallpapers already on my phone without uploading them for the world to use. I don't have the copyright to do that, so that's not an option.

Absolutely terrible. Used it once and it would put you in a loop of an ad and couldn't get out unless you closed all apps on your phone. Had it a few years ago and it caused all kinds of issues with the phone freezing etc. Once I uninstalled it before everything worked again properly. Figured I would give it another try. It is not usable unless you pay to not have ads....way too many. If you want an ad app, then download Zedge otherwise DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME.

For some reason, over this past year when I click play on one of my saved sounds, it just spins and never actually plays the sound, which is frustrating because often I have multiple sounds which are different but labelled the same, for instance "Train Whistle". I sure would appreciate it if someone could help resolve this issue...?

So many other fake apps out there with paid reviews. This one is blatantly superior. It lets you search for video game sounds (I use Yoshi and Starcraft probe) and from a huge selection of images for your background. Easily the best wallpaper and ringtone/ notification sound app out there. Ads are minimal, too. Ringtones and sounds set easily and stay set.

Always one of the first apps I DL when I change phones. I've never experienced any problems until now, the video wallpapers aren't loading/working correctly. I've changed it to several different ones and its still not working right. When you press the screen, it changes back to a previous wallpaper but not video just a picture of It. Please fix this problem, so I can enjoy my video wallpapers agai!!

This app used to be so much better... It gave you exactly what you looked up. After the dumb amount of ads and possibility to have a "premium" account, it's just drowning you in literally ANY AND EVERYTHING that has to do with the words you're looking up. I would honestly rather make my own. It'd be a lot quicker than digging through this mess. I miss the way Zedge was.

I'm having permissions issues. I have just paid $4.99 for the yearly subscription, given Zedge all permissions, and still can't download ringtones or notification sounds. Every time I try to download something, I get a "Permission needed, please grant via settings" error message. I have granted every permission. How do I get refunded my money for an app that I can't use? I have a Samsung Galaxy S22 ultra.

Used to love this app but now the ads make this app difficult to use. After you tap something to preview how it sounds, an ad will squeeze in underneath the thing you tapped and push the rest of the list down, making it really easy to accidentally tap the ad. Then there're the really long unskippable ads that will randomly pop up. Overall, very unpleasant experience and will be looking for alternatives now. Really disappointed it turned out like this.

It's been a great app for me for years and the only one I use for ringtones. The only suggestion I have is it would be way better to have more song variety for music artist and genres. I like Nigerian music but there's not a huge selection for that group or music artist as others. Even if you had to pay for premium music like the others least it's an option to chose from if it was available.

Love this app. There's so much variety. It's very user friendly. Been using it for years and is always one of the first apps I download on every new phone. Thanks so much, Zedge. Truly allows me to personalize my phone regardless of the mood I'm in or how much I want to change things up. Anything from contact ringtones to butterfly or lighthouse screensavers. I will say it again...I love this app.

Ads have gotten terrible. Its still one of the better ringtone apps. I have used this app for years banner ads were the only thing you had to deal with. about 4 years ago the ads got a bit excessive but now they are downright obtrusive. zedge got greedy and introduced a "paid" version and made the free version super annoying. its kinda sad.

While I have no problems with the app itself (I'm not too bothered by the ads), there seems to be a problem regarding the video wallpapers. Give or take a few days or weeks, the wallpaper tends to be removed and reset to the system default. As such, I have to head back into the app to reinstall the wallpaper.

Nice at first, but then goes insane with full screen pop up ads with tiny X windows that try to get you to accidentally click. Occasional ads between posts would be ok but this is bonkers. Also, you can't even change the download location to a dedicated wallpaper folder. That's like the most basic functionality guys. Worse still, it seems like most stuff is incredibly compressed.

Zedge is the best available for ringtonrs,notifications and wallpapers but the best part is that even if you subscribe to a monthly. version. it's STILL Practically FREE at only. 99 cents a month! if you need app for for r ring tones n wallpapers. you MUST sign up for Zedges monthly fee then head over for your 30 day free trial! needless to say I highly recommend. I've been using this app since I received my smart phon n t n at was ..... quiet a few years ago lol hurry don't wsit get zedge

Fantastic app, does exactly what I need it to and makes it easy to change my wallpaper, my ringtone and my alert tones. It's well built and has never had any issues. Would recommend 100% for every phone. I have used it on cheap handsets all the way up to the latest high tech ones and it's performed brilliantly across the board.

Ridiculous to have to listen to two ads after every ringtone sample. Desperate for another application that doesn't spam me for 5 minutes for 30 seconds worth of looking for ringtones. Edit; I guess you're just going to keep making it worse, now it seems to be connected to tiktok and spoon feeds you over to the Play store trying to push that down your throat, so it's a CCP data grabber now. No thanks.

This is a really good app! It has a good variety of music and comedy for ringtones and notification tones. The wallpapers they do have are really great! I have used this app for over 5 yrs now so I'm pretty happy with it overall. I just wish they would get some better artists for the wallpapers. they used to have a lot more music to choose from. Hopefully they will get those things back, but honestly for the money I haven't found a better app. Give it a try I think you'll love it

it's an app that let's you download ringtones and wallpapers. it gets a star lost because it heavily pushes it's premium, which has come out in recent versions. if you create an account you can also favorite your ringtones, so when you change phones you don't have to start all over finding them.

Stuffed full of ads. To download a wallpaper, you have to watch an ad. Not even a good app. Every time you open the app, or occasionally after having to sit through a long ad, they'll push their "premium version", which is basically the exact same app they had back in 2012. I'm assuming Zedge has been bought by some pigish corporation, because never before have I seen someone try to milk an honestly not that great app for all it's worth so hard. Just Google your wallpapers and pirate ring tones.

Way to ruin a good app. From throwing little ads where you're about to click, full-screen ads that bring you to the app store for trying to close them, and sprinkle some shameless Premium advertisement on top. Now this app is unusable. I can't even navigate it, not without an ad interrupting me, of course. And to think I'd redownload it just to find a louder notification sound, what a joke.

It used to be good but now there are way too many ads. You can see a page without these loud video ads. You cannot hardly use the app without a popup ad showing up right in the middle of you clicking on something and accidentally opening an ad. This is very sad that this app has turned into a spam machine.

App is too invasive. Does not let you decide where files get stored on your phone it just put some wherever it feels like it and then you have to go rooting through your phone later to put them where you want them. Video wallpapers don't actually store on your phone you have to set the darn wallpaper through Zedge. Way too many ads that act as malware

You have to re-download every few weeks. When you try it gets stuck on a game and freezes the screen. Try again and it's stuck on an ad that says how many seconds left of ad, but clock does not count down, it too freezes. Try a 3rd time and your clicked option disappears. Cool graphic if and when it works. Not all 3D video screens work.

I love this app. I have been just going crazy üòú the one thing that would be a great feature is if there was a way to be able to have like profile and when you have this app. You could add one or two more people in a profile so u our spouse could have a chance to get this app too I was just thinking since we use the same card to purchase its just would be cool !!!

I really liked it but started having problems with it. I can only give y'alls app maybe a 2 and a half or 3. My daughter got me to using this app plus a few other people had also said this was a great app, but I'm not the only one having the same problems. So now when I try to listen to some of the music it just keeps circling and want play at all and others will play. I'm gonna have to find another app that works and pray it will be better

A friend introduced me to Zedge years ago and now I install it on every phone I get! I love the wallpapers and ringtones fellow users upload and have uploaded a few music ringTUNES of my own. I wish there were less ads when choosing between different papers/tones as it gets a little annoying but the premium isn't worth it to me so I just complain to myself (mostly). They're the only things keeping me from rating 5 stars.

Lost all my zedge coins. I had 1,010 now I have none. Hopefully this can be fixed. I've been with zedge for over 6 years. The 1st time This happened was a few years back and was then fixed, thank you for that. So I was hoping you could fix this 1 for me, I do pay for the sevice every month. PLEASE. Thank you. REAH

Unfortunately, due to number of LONG ads that you can't interrupt (unless of course you pay) this app isn't worth it any more, especially when there hundreds of sites with sounds w/no ads who let you go download for free. Also, it's become incredibly slow. I click on a sound, the circle starts spinning then... nothing. I just counted a minute & 1/2 before I gave up. My connection is fine, app is updated, phone is brand new - only 5 days old. I've used Zedge from day one. Goodbye.

Used it happily for years. Ads on banners, Ads for downloads or wallpaper use. It was OK, balance between my needs and developers needs, all good. But now, you can't scroll, click, view or just try to use the app without ad after ad after ad. Uninstalling, it's tooo much
